page.title: 03Julie's Story Continued.
page.content: Dad gets home about 6.45pm if he is not out on call. Dad also works nights, when he does he goes out about 5.00pm and comes home about 9.45am the next day. The station which he is at is quite busy. Mom works at one of the local hotels called Eaton Lodge. She's worked there for nearly 10 years as a silver service waitress. Mom has no set days to work, just when they need her which on average is about three times a week plus weekends. Most of her diners are residents (people who stay in the hotel) some are non-residents. They are busy nearly every night, but Mom enjoys it when it's busy. The hotel has an al-a-carte menu for the evenings, but a cheaper menu at lunch time. Mom also trains any new girls who want to become waitresses. She enjoys the work as she meets all kinds of people.
